page.title: 14 INDUSTRY
page.content: One of the industries in our area is a poultry farm. They have 21000 chickens.Ventilation is very important so there are{21}fans,{1 fan to every {1000}birds. The heat in the building is produced from the birds being so close together.On some days eggs are graded. This is done by putting a tray of eggs on to a moving belt, automatic suckers then pick up the eggs and gently drop them on to another moving belt, the eggs then roll off into little dishes which weighs the eggs.They then roll off to the correct graded collecting point.When the chickens first come to the farm they lay about{18000 }eggs per day, then just before they leave they lay about{15000 }eggs per day.The birds stay at the farm for just over a year, 12 to 13 months.
